|brand = Netgear |model = GS108 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = T |revision = v3 |subrevision = (rev A1) |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 10/27/2020 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Netgear_GS108Tv3 |series = <!-- Device series --> |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification -->
|fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |pcb_id = 2976593702 |ethoui = 9C:C9:EB
|cpu1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8380M; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 4KEc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 500 <!-- doc? --> |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L25635F; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Winbond;W631GG8MB; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth4chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|sw_cpu = true |sw2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |sw3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|eth_ports = 8 |eth_speed = 1GbE |eth_conn = 8P8C |eth_conn_dongle = |eth_standard = <!-- IEEE 802.3/3u/3ab --> |auto_mdix = supported |sup_jumbo = yes |sw_class = smart
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_poe_type = af |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes, 4-pin header, 3.3V TTL, (115200,8,N,1),, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |is_manuf = No |manuf = Delta Networks |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = Serial GPIO/LED Display Controller;Realtek;RTL8231;;1;,,, 15W PoE PD Controller;MPS;MP8001;;1;,,, Monolithic Flyback/Forward DC-DC Converter;MPS;MP6002;;1;,,, 3A Schottky Barrier Rectifier;Diodes Inc;B340A;;3;,,, 8-bit Serial-in, Parallel-out Shift Register;NXP;74HC164D;;2;,,, 3-State Quad Buffer/Line Driver;NXP;74LVC125A;;1;,,, 1-Channel Photocoupler;LiteOn;LTV-817;;2; |flags = metal case, Link Aggregation, smart switch, heatsink |tpfirmware = OpenWrt |accessible_UART =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 09/2019 |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |reldate = <!-- Release date --> |upc = 606449138610 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |newegg = <!-- Newegg number --> |asin = B07PS6Z162 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Thailand
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|in|mm}} {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|mm|in}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|switch}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *Processor: [[Realtek]] RTL8380M Multi-Layer Managed Switch :Controller with Embedded MIPS 4KEc @500MHz *Flash/RAM: 32MB (SPI NOR) Flash, 128MB RAM (DDR3L) *8x Gigabit Ethernet ports, 1 w/ PD for PoE af input *16Gbps switching capacity
{{See also|Netgear GS108Tv1|Netgear}}
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/netgear/netgear_gs108t_v3 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/netgear/gs108t_v3 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = realtek |subtarget = rtl838x |arch = mips_4kec |support_started_version = 21.02.0 |current_supported_version = auto |unsupportedfuncntions = Ethernet LEDs |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
==Links of Interest== *[https://svanheule.net/switches/gs108tv3 ''Netgear GS108T v3'' on '''Realtek switch Linux support''' wiki] :PCB ID: "2976593702" ([[Delta Networks]]))
